trans-unit.source: This class contains the [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/add/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] extension methods for XSD validation.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen inneholder den [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/add/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] utvidelsen metoder for XSD-validering.

trans-unit.source: This class also contains methods to get the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI) of a validated XML node.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen inneholder metoder for å få post schema validering infoset (PSVI) for en godkjent XML-node.

trans-unit.source: When you validate an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument>, <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>, or <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute>, you can also optionally populate the XML tree with the post-schema-validation infoset.
trans-unit.target: Når du validerer en <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument>, <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>, eller <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute>, du kan også fylle ut XML-treet med post-schema-validering infoset.</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement> </xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument>

trans-unit.source: PSVI information is added as an annotation of type <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: PSVI informasjon legges til som en merknad av typen <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Gets the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI) of a validated attribute.
trans-unit.target: Henter post schema validering infoset (PSVI) for et godkjent attributt.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo> returned by this method to determine certain characteristics of a validated attribute.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo>returneres av denne metoden for å bestemme enkelte egenskaper for et godkjent attributt.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can determine if the attribute came from a default attribute value in an XSD.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel finne ut om attributtet kommer fra en standardverdi for attributtet i en XSD.

trans-unit.source: You use the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo.SchemaAttribute%2A> property to get a partial validation type (<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute>).
trans-unit.target: Du bruker den <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo.SchemaAttribute%2A>til å hente en delvis Valideringstype (<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute>).</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo.SchemaAttribute%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use it to revalidate an attribute without validating an entire document.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den til Valider på nytt et attributt uten å validere hele dokumentet.

trans-unit.source: For an example of this property, see <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.Validate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Et eksempel på denne egenskapen, kan du se <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.Validate%2A>.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute> that has been previously validated.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute>som har blitt validert tidligere.</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo"></xref> that contains the post-schema-validation infoset for an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo"> </xref> som inneholder post schema validering infoset for <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute>.</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Gets the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI) of a validated element.
trans-unit.target: Henter post schema validering infoset (PSVI) for et godkjent element.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo> returned by this method to determine certain characteristics of a validated element.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo>returneres av denne metoden for å bestemme enkelte egenskaper for et godkjent element.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can determine the dynamic schema type of the element.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel fastslå dynamiske skjemaet elementtype.

trans-unit.source: You use the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo.SchemaElement%2A> property to get a partial validation type (<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement>).
trans-unit.target: Du bruker den <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo.SchemaElement%2A>til å hente en delvis Valideringstype (<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement>).</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo.SchemaElement%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use it to revalidate a sub-tree with an element at its root without validating an entire document.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den til Valider undertreet med et element på roten på nytt uten å validere hele dokumentet.

trans-unit.source: For an example of this property, see <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.Validate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Et eksempel på denne egenskapen, kan du se <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.Validate%2A>.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement> that has been previously validated.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>som har blitt validert tidligere.</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo"></xref> that contains the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI) for an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo"> </xref> som inneholder post schema validering infoset (PSVI) for en <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>.</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>

trans-unit.source: This method validates that an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument> conforms to an XSD in an <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden validerer som en <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument>overholder en XSD i en <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"> </xref>.</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument>

trans-unit.source: This extension method validates that the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument> conforms to the schema content model in <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>.
trans-unit.target: Denne utvidelsen metoden validerer som <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument>er i samsvar med skjemaet innholdsmodellen i <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> </xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument> to validate.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument>til å validere.</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref> to validate against.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"> </xref> til å validere mot.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler"></xref> for an event that occurs when the reader encounters validation errors.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler"> </xref> for en hendelse som oppstår når leseren støter valideringsfeil.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, throws an exception upon validation errors.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, oppstår det et unntak ved valideringsfeil.

trans-unit.source: Thrown for XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) validation errors.
trans-unit.target: Et XML-skjema Definition Language (XSD) valideringsfeilene.

trans-unit.source: This method validates that an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute> conforms to a specified <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"></xref> and an <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden validerer som en <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute>oppfyller kravene til et angitt <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"> </xref> og en <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"> </xref>.</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute>

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to validate that an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute> conforms to a schema.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne metoden til å validere som en <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute>overholder et skjema.</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute>

trans-unit.source: You typically use this method when you have modified an attribute, and you want to make sure that it still conforms to its schema.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes vanligvis når du har endret et attributt, og du vil forsikre deg om at det fortsatt overholder XML-skjemaet.

trans-unit.source: You could validate the entire document, but it takes less processing time to validate just the attribute.
trans-unit.target: Du kan validere hele dokumentet, men det tar mindre behandlingstid til å validere bare attributtet.

trans-unit.source: If you pass `null` for `validationEventHandler`, this method raises an exception upon validation errors.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du sender `null` for `validationEventHandler`, denne metoden viser et unntak ved valideringsfeil.

trans-unit.source: Validation warnings will not raise an exception.
trans-unit.target: Valideringsadvarsler kan ikke vise et unntak.

trans-unit.source: To validate an attribute, you use an instance of <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>.
trans-unit.target: For å validere et attributt må bruke du en forekomst av <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>

trans-unit.source: You can obtain this instance in various ways.
trans-unit.target: Du kan få denne forekomsten på forskjellige måter.

trans-unit.source: An easy way is as follows: 1.
trans-unit.target: En enkel måte er som følger: 1.

trans-unit.source: Validate that a document conforms to a schema.
trans-unit.target: Validere at et dokument overholder et skjema.

trans-unit.source: Add the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI) by calling the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.Validate%2A> extension method.
trans-unit.target: Legg til post schema validering infoset (PSVI) ved å ringe det <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.Validate%2A>utvidelsen-metoden.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A> extension method to retrieve an object that implements <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo>.
trans-unit.target: Kall <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A>utvidelsen metode for å hente et objekt som implementerer <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo>.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A>

trans-unit.source: From the retrieved object, you can get an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan få en <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject> fra hentede-objektet

trans-unit.source: - If you get an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject> for an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>, the type will be <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement>.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis du får en <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>for en <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>typen <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement>.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement> </xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>

trans-unit.source: - If you get an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject> for an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute>, the type will be <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis du får en <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>for en <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute>typen <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute>.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>

trans-unit.source: After you have an instance of an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>, you can use this method to validate an attribute.
trans-unit.target: Når du har en forekomst av en <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>, kan du bruke denne metoden til å validere et attributt.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute> to validate.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute>til å validere.</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"></xref> that specifies the sub-tree to validate.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"> </xref> som angir undertreet til å validere.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref> to validate against.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"> </xref> til å validere mot.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler"></xref> for an event that occurs when the reader encounters validation errors.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler"> </xref> for en hendelse som oppstår når leseren støter valideringsfeil.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, throws an exception upon validation errors.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, oppstår det et unntak ved valideringsfeil.

trans-unit.source: Thrown for XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) validation errors.
trans-unit.target: Et XML-skjema Definition Language (XSD) valideringsfeilene.

trans-unit.source: Validates that an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument> conforms to an XSD in an <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref>, optionally populating the XML tree with the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI).
trans-unit.target: Validerer som en <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument>overholder en XSD i en <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"> </xref>, eventuelt utfylling XML-treet med post-schema-validering infoset (PSVI).</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument>

trans-unit.source: This extension method validates that the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument> conforms to the schema content model in <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>.
trans-unit.target: Denne utvidelsen metoden validerer som <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument>er i samsvar med skjemaet innholdsmodellen i <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> </xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument>

trans-unit.source: If `addSchemaInfo` is `true`, this method populates the XML tree with the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI).
trans-unit.target: Hvis `addSchemaInfo` er `true`, denne metoden fyller ut XML-treet med post-schema-validering infoset (PSVI).

trans-unit.source: There are two steps to populating the XML tree with the PSVI.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes to trinn utfylling XML-treet med PSVI.

trans-unit.source: First, an annotation is added to all nodes in the tree to enable you to call <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName> on an element or attribute in the tree.
trans-unit.target: Først merknaden er lagt til alle nodene i treet slik at du vil kalle <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName>eller <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName>på et element eller attributt i treet.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Second, default elements and attributes defined in the XSD are added to the XML tree.
trans-unit.target: Det andre er standard elementer og attributter som er definert i XSDEN som lagt til i XML-treet.

trans-unit.source: By calling one of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A> methods, you can determine if a specific element or attribute was added from the XSD as a default element or attribute.
trans-unit.target: Ved å kalle en av de <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A>metoder, kan du bestemme om en bestemt elementet eller attributtet ble lagt til fra XSDEN som standardelementet eller attributtet.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument> to validate.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument>til å validere.</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref> to validate against.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"> </xref> til å validere mot.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler"></xref> for an event that occurs when the reader encounters validation errors.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler"> </xref> for en hendelse som oppstår når leseren støter valideringsfeil.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, throws an exception upon validation errors.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, oppstår det et unntak ved valideringsfeil.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> indicating whether to populate the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI).
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Boolean>som angir om å fylle ut post schema validering infoset (PSVI).</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Thrown for XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) validation errors.
trans-unit.target: Et XML-skjema Definition Language (XSD) valideringsfeilene.

trans-unit.source: This method validates that an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement> sub-tree conforms to a specified <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"></xref> and an <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden validerer som en <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>undertreet overholder et angitt <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"> </xref> og en <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"> </xref>.</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to validate that a sub-tree (with an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement> at its root) conforms to a schema.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne metoden til å validere som en undertreet (med en <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>på roten) samsvarer med et XML-skjema.</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>

trans-unit.source: You typically use this method when you have modified a sub-tree, and you want to make sure that it still conforms to its schema.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes vanligvis når du har endret et undertre, og du vil forsikre deg om at det fortsatt overholder XML-skjemaet.

trans-unit.source: You could validate the entire document, but it takes less processing time to validate a just a sub-tree.
trans-unit.target: Du kan validere hele dokumentet, men det tar mindre behandlingstid til å validere nettopp har et undertre.

trans-unit.source: If you pass `null` for `validationEventHandler`, then this method raises an exception upon validation errors.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du sender `null` for `validationEventHandler`, og denne metoden viser et unntak ved valideringsfeil.

trans-unit.source: Validation warnings will not raise an exception.
trans-unit.target: Valideringsadvarsler kan ikke vise et unntak.

trans-unit.source: To validate a sub-tree, you use an instance of <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>.
trans-unit.target: For å validere en undertreet må bruke du en forekomst av <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>

trans-unit.source: You can obtain this instance in various ways.
trans-unit.target: Du kan få denne forekomsten på forskjellige måter.

trans-unit.source: An easy way is as follows: 1.
trans-unit.target: En enkel måte er som følger: 1.

trans-unit.source: Validate that a document conforms to a schema.
trans-unit.target: Validere at et dokument overholder et skjema.

trans-unit.source: Add the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI) by calling the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.Validate%2A> extension method.
trans-unit.target: Legg til post schema validering infoset (PSVI) ved å ringe det <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.Validate%2A>utvidelsen-metoden.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A> extension method to retrieve an object that implements <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo>.
trans-unit.target: Kall <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A>utvidelsen metode for å hente et objekt som implementerer <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo>.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A>

trans-unit.source: From the retrieved object, you can get an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan få en <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject> fra hentede-objektet

trans-unit.source: - If you get an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject> for an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>, the type will be <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement>.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis du får en <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>for en <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>typen <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement>.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement> </xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>

trans-unit.source: - If you get an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject> for an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute>, the type will be <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis du får en <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>for en <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute>typen <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute>.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>

trans-unit.source: After you have an instance of an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>, you can use this method to validate an sub-tree.
trans-unit.target: Når du har en forekomst av en <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>, kan du bruke denne metoden til å validere en undertreet.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement> to validate.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>til å validere.</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"></xref> that specifies the sub-tree to validate.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"> </xref> som angir undertreet til å validere.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref> to validate against.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"> </xref> til å validere mot.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler"></xref> for an event that occurs when the reader encounters validation errors.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler"> </xref> for en hendelse som oppstår når leseren støter valideringsfeil.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, throws an exception upon validation errors.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, oppstår det et unntak ved valideringsfeil.

trans-unit.source: Thrown for XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) validation errors.
trans-unit.target: Et XML-skjema Definition Language (XSD) valideringsfeilene.

trans-unit.source: Validates that an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute> conforms to a specified <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"></xref> and an <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref>, optionally populating the XML tree with the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI).
trans-unit.target: Validerer som en <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute>oppfyller kravene til et angitt <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"> </xref> og en <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"> </xref>, eventuelt utfylling XML-treet med post-schema-validering infoset (PSVI).</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute>

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to validate that an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute> conforms to a schema.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne metoden til å validere som en <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute>overholder et skjema.</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute>

trans-unit.source: You typically use this method when you have modified an attribute, and you want to make sure that it still conforms to its schema.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes vanligvis når du har endret et attributt, og du vil forsikre deg om at det fortsatt overholder XML-skjemaet.

trans-unit.source: You could validate the entire document, but it takes less processing time to validate just the attribute.
trans-unit.target: Du kan validere hele dokumentet, men det tar mindre behandlingstid til å validere bare attributtet.

trans-unit.source: If `addSchemaInfo` is `true`, this method populates the attribute with the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI).
trans-unit.target: Hvis `addSchemaInfo` er `true`, denne metoden fyller ut attributtet med post-schema-validering infoset (PSVI).

trans-unit.source: After you have populated the XML tree with the PSVI, you can call <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName> on the validated attribute.
trans-unit.target: Når du har fylt ut i XML-treet med PSVI, kan du kalle <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName>på attributtet godkjent.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This is useful if you are writing code that relies on data returned by <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nyttig hvis du skriver kode som er avhenger av dataene som ble returnert av <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A>.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you pass `null` for `validationEventHandler`, then this method raises an exception upon validation errors.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du sender `null` for `validationEventHandler`, og denne metoden viser et unntak ved valideringsfeil.

trans-unit.source: Validation warnings will not raise an exception.
trans-unit.target: Valideringsadvarsler kan ikke vise et unntak.

trans-unit.source: To validate an attribute, you use an instance of <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>.
trans-unit.target: For å validere et attributt må bruke du en forekomst av <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>

trans-unit.source: You can obtain this instance in various ways.
trans-unit.target: Du kan få denne forekomsten på forskjellige måter.

trans-unit.source: An easy way is as follows: 1.
trans-unit.target: En enkel måte er som følger: 1.

trans-unit.source: Validate that a document conforms to a schema.
trans-unit.target: Validere at et dokument overholder et skjema.

trans-unit.source: Add the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI) by calling the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.Validate%2A> extension method.
trans-unit.target: Legg til post schema validering infoset (PSVI) ved å ringe det <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.Validate%2A>utvidelsen-metoden.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A> extension method to retrieve an object that implements <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo>.
trans-unit.target: Kall <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A>utvidelsen metode for å hente et objekt som implementerer <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo>.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A>

trans-unit.source: From the retrieved object, you can get an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan få en <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject> fra hentede-objektet

trans-unit.source: - If you get an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject> for an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>, the type will be <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement>.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis du får en <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>for en <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>typen <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement>.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement> </xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>

trans-unit.source: - If you get an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject> for an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute>, the type will be <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis du får en <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>for en <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute>typen <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute>.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>

trans-unit.source: After you have an instance of an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>, you can use this method to validate an attribute.
trans-unit.target: Når du har en forekomst av en <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>, kan du bruke denne metoden til å validere et attributt.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute> to validate.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute>til å validere.</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"></xref> that specifies the sub-tree to validate.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"> </xref> som angir undertreet til å validere.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref> to validate against.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"> </xref> til å validere mot.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler"></xref> for an event that occurs when the reader encounters validation errors.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler"> </xref> for en hendelse som oppstår når leseren støter valideringsfeil.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, throws an exception upon validation errors.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, oppstår det et unntak ved valideringsfeil.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> indicating whether to populate the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI).
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Boolean>som angir om å fylle ut post schema validering infoset (PSVI).</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Thrown for XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) validation errors.
trans-unit.target: Et XML-skjema Definition Language (XSD) valideringsfeilene.

trans-unit.source: Validates that an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement> sub-tree conforms to a specified <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"></xref> and an <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref>, optionally populating the XML tree with the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI).
trans-unit.target: Validerer som en <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>undertreet overholder et angitt <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"> </xref> og en <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"> </xref>, eventuelt utfylling XML-treet med post-schema-validering infoset (PSVI).</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to validate that a sub-tree (with an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement> at the root of the sub-tree) conforms to a schema.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne metoden til å validere som en undertreet (med en <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>nederst i undertreet) samsvarer med et XML-skjema.</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>

trans-unit.source: You typically use this method when you have modified a sub-tree, and you want to make sure that it still conforms to its schema.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes vanligvis når du har endret et undertre, og du vil forsikre deg om at det fortsatt overholder XML-skjemaet.

trans-unit.source: You could validate the entire document, but it takes less processing time to validate a just a sub-tree.
trans-unit.target: Du kan validere hele dokumentet, men det tar mindre behandlingstid til å validere nettopp har et undertre.

trans-unit.source: If `addSchemaInfo` is `true`, then this method populates the XML tree with the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI).
trans-unit.target: Hvis `addSchemaInfo` er `true`, og denne metoden fyller ut XML-treet med post-schema-validering infoset (PSVI).

trans-unit.source: There are two aspects of populating the XML tree with the PSVI.
trans-unit.target: Det er to aspekter ved utfylling XML-treet med PSVI.

trans-unit.source: First, an annotation is added to all nodes in the tree such that you can now call <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A> on an element or attribute in the tree.
trans-unit.target: Først merknaden er lagt til alle nodene i treet slik at du kan nå ringe <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A>på et element eller attributt i treet.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A>

trans-unit.source: Second, default elements and attributes defined in the XSD are added to the XML tree.
trans-unit.target: Det andre er standard elementer og attributter som er definert i XSDEN som lagt til i XML-treet.

trans-unit.source: By calling one of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A> methods, you can determine if a specific element or attribute was added from the XSD as a default element or attribute.
trans-unit.target: Ved å kalle en av de <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A>metoder, kan du bestemme om en bestemt elementet eller attributtet ble lagt til fra XSDEN som standardelementet eller attributtet.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you pass `null` for `validationEventHandler`, then this method raises an exception upon validation errors.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du sender `null` for `validationEventHandler`, og denne metoden viser et unntak ved valideringsfeil.

trans-unit.source: Validation warnings will not raise an exception.
trans-unit.target: Valideringsadvarsler kan ikke vise et unntak.

trans-unit.source: To validate a sub-tree, you use an instance of <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>.
trans-unit.target: For å validere en undertreet må bruke du en forekomst av <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>

trans-unit.source: You can obtain this instance in various ways.
trans-unit.target: Du kan få denne forekomsten på forskjellige måter.

trans-unit.source: An easy way is as follows: 1.
trans-unit.target: En enkel måte er som følger: 1.

trans-unit.source: Validate that a document conforms to a schema.
trans-unit.target: Validere at et dokument overholder et skjema.

trans-unit.source: Add the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI) by calling the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.Validate%2A> extension method.
trans-unit.target: Legg til post schema validering infoset (PSVI) ved å ringe det <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.Validate%2A>utvidelsen-metoden.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A> extension method to retrieve an object that implements <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo>.
trans-unit.target: Kall <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A>utvidelsen metode for å hente et objekt som implementerer <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo>.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A>

trans-unit.source: From the retrieved object, you can get an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan få en <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject> fra hentede-objektet

trans-unit.source: - If you get an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject> for an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>, the type will be <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement>.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis du får en <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>for en <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>typen <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement>.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement> </xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>

trans-unit.source: - If you get an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject> for an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute>, the type will be <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis du får en <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>for en <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute>typen <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute>.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>

trans-unit.source: After you have an instance of an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>, you can use this method to validate a sub-tree..
trans-unit.target: Når du har en forekomst av en <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>kan du bruke denne metoden for å validere undertreet.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement> to validate.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>til å validere.</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"></xref> that specifies the sub-tree to validate.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"> </xref> som angir undertreet til å validere.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref> to validate against.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"> </xref> til å validere mot.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler"></xref> for an event that occurs when the reader encounters validation errors.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler"> </xref> for en hendelse som oppstår når leseren støter valideringsfeil.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, throws an exception upon validation errors.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, oppstår det et unntak ved valideringsfeil.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> indicating whether to populate the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI).
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Boolean>som angir om å fylle ut post schema validering infoset (PSVI).</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Thrown for XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) validation errors.
trans-unit.target: Et XML-skjema Definition Language (XSD) valideringsfeilene.
